cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Both players Draw 2 cards.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 3 cards then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Add 1 Earth Equipment other than 'Emerald Dagger' from your Grave to your Hand.
[PASSIVE] While this card is equipped to a Champion: that Champion gains 50 max health. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to any Slot.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Flip a coin. If heads: Deal 30 damage to a Champion. If tails: Deal 20 damage to this Champion.
[TRIGGER] When an Equipment card equipped to this Champion (excluding 'Greedy Rage') is sent to the Grave: Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Heal 10 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 40 damage to a Champion then Destroy all cards equipped to this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Draw 4 cards and Discard 1 card.
[PASSIVE] While you control 4 'Quarter Pillar of the Sky’s: you win the game.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 5 Air Equipment from your Grave into your Deck then Draw a card.
[ACTIVATED] If you have 3 copies of ‘Wings of the Next Angel’ in your Grave: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 30 damage to a Champion and Destroy this card. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to a Fire Slot.
[ACTIVATED] Send 1 Earth Equipment from Deck to Grave then Destroy this card.
[ACTIVATED] Add 1 'Fireball' from Deck or Grave to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion then Destroy this card if you control multiple Champions.
[ACTIVATED] Heal 30 damage from a Champion then Destroy this card.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion then Destroy this card and Add ‘Raging Sea of the West’ from your Grave to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Heal 10 damage from each of your Champions then Destroy this card and Add ‘Raging Sea of the East’ from your Grave to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is sent to the Grave: Draw 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion and Return this card to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion then Destroy this card. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Add 1 'Crimson Cataclysm' from your Deck to your Hand.
[TRIGGER] If this card is discarded or destroyed: Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] If this card is discarded: Heal 10 damage from a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] If this card is Discarded or Destroyed: you can Destroy 1 Air Equipment you control then Draw 2 cards.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Add 1 'Tidal Wave' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Return 1 'Vital Bloom' from your Field to your Hand then Deal 10 damage to this Champion and 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Return 1 'Withering Thorns' from your Field to your Hand then Heal 20 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 'Catalyst Orb' you control then Heal 20 damage from the Champion that was equipped with that 'Catalyst Orb'.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy every 'Grenade' you control and Deal 30 damage to a Champion for each 'Grenade' destroyed.
[ACTIVATED] If you control another 'Accelerating Particle': Destroy all Equipment on the Field. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to any Slot.

[ACTIVATED] Return this card to the Hand and Destroy 1 Equipment equipped to this Champion then Deal 40 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed by the effect of 'Bloodrite': Return it to the Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment equipped to this Champion then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: you can Add any number of 'Droplet' from Deck to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Equipment you control then Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 4 ‘Fireball’ from your Grave into your Deck then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Send 1 ‘Spirit of Eurydice’ from your Deck to your Grave then Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to this Champion and Draw 2 cards.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal damage to a Champion equal to 10 X the number of cards your opponent drew last turn.
[PASSIVE] While this card is equipped to a Champion: that Champion gains 30 max health. [TRIGGER] If this card would be destroyed: Heal 30 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] When this Champion takes damage: Draw 1 card then Discard 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] Declare 'Spell' or 'Equipment' then your opponent draws a card and reveals it and if you called it correctly: Deal 60 damage to a Champion and Destroy this card.
[TRIGGER] If this Champion would take damage: you can Destroy this card instead.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 1 'Washed Out to Sea' from your Grave into your Deck then Shuffle 1 Equipment from the Field into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to this Champion and 20 damage to a Champion. [PASSIVE] May be equipped to a Water Slot.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion that was healed last turn.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each Champion with no Equipment equipped.
[ACTIVATED] Add 'Infection' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 30 damage to a Champion then Shuffle this card into the Deck. [PASSIVE] This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Spells.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment equipped to this Champion then either Heal 30 damage from this Champion or Deal 30 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Equip 1 copy of 'Phoenix Feather' from Deck to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Draw 2 cards. [ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Draw a card.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Deal 20 damage to a Champion then Destroy this card.

[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Destroy 1 'Repun Kamuy' you control then Deal 20 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Add 1 'Repun Kamuy' from Grave to Hand.
[TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Destroy 1 'Tui' you control then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: you can Add 1 'Tui' from Grave to Hand.
[TRIGGER] When this Champion is healed: Draw a card then Discard a card.
[ACTIVATED] If your opponent activated a spell last turn: you can Add 1 or more copies of that spell from your Deck or Grave to Hand then Destroy this card.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 2 Air Equipment then Place this card as a Champion with 50 health and 1 Air Slot.
